name: Yahoo! Weather Plugin
author: Muhammad Yasir khan

sections.description:
Yahoo Weather Widget in new look, with multiple locations weather.Put your city weather in post/page or widget. Easy to customize and support multi-widget.
Enhanced Weather Icons and output with diffrent cities and two slider animation.

Options

  • 1.Admin Panel
  • 2.Inert Multiple Locations codes
  • 3.Temperature Options
  • 4.Easly customizable Stylesheets.
  • 4.Switch two front-end styles in admin panel

Credits

  • 1.Yahoo Weather.
  • 2.Weather Location Codes/IDs.

Usage

  • Use shorte code [ywsc] in your post/page.
  • Use as widget write shortcode [ywsc] in text widget.
  • Note:if your theme does not support widget shortcode put “add_filter(‘widget_text’, ‘do_shortcode’)” in yout function.php file.
sections.installation:
You can use the built-in installer, or you can install the plugin manually.

  • 1. Go to the menu ‘Plugins’ -> ‘Install’ and search for ‘Yahoo Weather plugin.
  • 2. Click ‘install’.
  • 3. After installation check the setting menu for options.
